remarks: Equality of restricted class abstractions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
statement:
rabeqbidva.1 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
rabeqbidva.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rabeqbidva $p |- ( ph -> { x e. A | ps } = { x e. B | ch } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
